ingredients.item: 180g pack 2 red Romano peppers, deseeded and cut into small chunks
½ x 25g pack flat leaf parsley, chopped

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large shallow pan or frying pan, add the onions and peppers and fry gently for 6-8 minutes or until softened and just starting to colour. Add the garlic and cook for a further 1 minute. Stir in the puttanesca mix, paprika and stock and bring to a gentle simmer. Stir in two-thirds of the parsley.
Place the cod loin on top and cover with a lid. Cook gently for about 5 minutes until the fish is cooked through. Serve sprinkled with the remaining parsley.
